data.name: AccidentLogs
data.comment: A record of settlement incidents which resulted in some degree of physical injury.

data.name: AirQualityReports
data.comment: Chemical analyses of atmospheric recycling systems in surface settlements.

data.name: Amm_Grenade_EMP
data.comment: A deployable device that temporarily disrupts shields with an electromagnetic pulse.

data.name: Amm_Grenade_Frag
data.comment: An explosive weapon that damages nearby targets upon detonation.

data.name: Amm_Grenade_Shield
data.comment: A deployable device that generates a barrier designed to absorb incoming attacks.

data.name: AtmosphericData
data.comment: Scientific observations and measurements of a planet's atmosphere.

data.name: BiochemicalAgent
data.comment: A compound designed to break down organic tissue.

data.name: BlacklistData
data.comment: Sensitive information regarding individuals and/or groups deemed untrustworthy or dangerous.

data.name: BloodTestResults
data.comment: Blood test data related to settlement health checks and policy adherence.

data.name: BuildingSchematic
data.comment: A technical blueprint detailing the architectural design of a building.

data.name: Bypass
data.comment: A single-use device used to circumvent security systems.

data.name: CampaignPlans
data.comment: Information, schedules and objectives for a large-scale public initiative.

data.name: CatMedia
data.comment: A collection of amusing, sharable digital media often spanning several centuries.

data.name: CensusData
data.comment: Detailed information and statistics on the size and composition of a population.

data.name: ChemicalExperimentData
data.comment: Proposals and research results related to various chemical experiments.

data.name: ChemicalFormulae
data.comment: Data related to the classification and research applications of newly developed chemicals.

data.name: ChemicalInventory
data.comment: A detailed log of active and inert chemical materials stored within a facility.

data.name: ChemicalPatents
data.comment: A list of registered patent applications for chemical inventions.

data.name: CombatantPerformance
data.comment: Observational data on a subject's proficiency in ground-based combat operations.

data.name: CombatTrainingMaterial
data.comment: Training plans and exercises designed to improve overall battlefield effectiveness.

data.name: CompactLibrary
data.comment: A large selection of literary classics and reference works in digital form.

data.name: DegradedPowerRegulator
data.comment: A non-functional fuel regulator used in power plants.

data.name: DutyRota
data.comment: Details of the activities and schedules of all personnel at a settlement.

data.name: EmployeeDirectory
data.comment: A complete list of staff members with their relevant personal details.

data.name: EmployeeGeneticData
data.comment: Unique genetic data records for a settlement's past and current personnel.

data.name: EnergyCell
data.comment: A single-use item that restores energy to suit batteries.

data.name: EvacuationProtocols
data.comment: Detailed instructions for the abandonment of a settlement by all registered personnel.

data.name: ExplorationJournals
data.comment: Collected first-hand accounts of the author’s experiences and discoveries in deep space.

data.name: FactionAssociates
data.comment: Information on a faction's political allies and related beneficial relationships.

data.name: FactionDonatorList
data.comment: A record of individuals or organsiations that have made financial contributions to a faction.

data.name: FactionNews
data.comment: Publicly available press releases and ongoing news stories related to a faction.

data.name: FinancialProjections
data.comment: Forecasts of a company's future income, expenditure and profit margins.

data.name: HealthPack
data.comment: A portable medical kit used to treat wounds.

data.name: Hush
data.comment: A recreational drug that induces a state of extreme relaxation while limiting auditory input.

data.name: Infinity
data.comment: A brand of exotic cologne that chemically adapts to please the olfactory system.

data.name: Insight
data.comment: A wearable device designed to provide the user with real-time information about their immediate environment.

data.name: InsightEntertainmentSuite
data.comment: A selection of augmented-reality games for use with an Insight device.

data.name: InternalCorrespondence
data.comment: A record of communications by members within an organisation's network.

data.name: LargeCapacityPowerRegulator
data.comment: A complex device designed to regulate the energy generated by a settlement's power reactor.

data.name: Lazarus
data.comment: A recreational drug that places the user in state of euphoric oblivion, sometimes for as long as four days.

data.name: LiteraryFiction
data.comment: Text-based fictional entertainment in a range of genres and styles.

data.name: MaintenanceLogs
data.comment: Records of routine tasks to maintain settlement equipment or infrastructure.

data.name: MeetingMinutes
data.comment: A record of discussion topics and action points from a meeting of settlement personnel.

data.name: MineralSurvey
data.comment: Results from a study of mineral deposits hidden beneath the surface of a planet.

data.name: MultimediaEntertainment
data.comment: A range of popular entertainment products available in multiple formats.

data.name: NetworkAccessHistory
data.comment: Access records detailing individual user activity on specific networks.

data.name: NextOfKinRecords
data.comment: Details of an individual's closest living relatives, partners and designated contacts.

data.name: NOCData
data.comment: Non-official cover information related to covert agents active in various organisations.

data.name: OperationalManual
data.comment: Instructive texts for the use and maintenance of a mechanism, system or vehicle.

data.name: PatrolRoutes
data.comment: Deployment schedules and paths used in routine security operations.

data.name: PayrollInformation
data.comment: Staff members' past and present salary payments and financial transfer methods.

data.name: PersonalLogs
data.comment: Private text or audio/visual recordings made by an individual.

data.name: PharmaceuticalPatents
data.comment: A list of registered patent applications each relating to a specific drug.

data.name: ProductionReports
data.comment: Work logs that collate information on cost, output and requirements.

data.name: ProductionSchedule
data.comment: A detailed timetable outlining machine allocations, worker requirements and associated deadlines.

data.name: PurchaseRecords
data.comment: A list of purchased items and materials including total costs and supplier details.

data.name: PurchaseRequests
data.comment: Requisition orders for specific items or materials submitted for authorisation.

data.name: Push
data.comment: A recreational drug that temporarily increases cognitive function.

data.name: RadioactivityData
data.comment: Measurements of the output from natural or artificial sources of radiation.

data.name: ReactorOutputReview
data.comment: Analysis and measurement of energy production from a settlement's power centre.

data.name: ResidentialDirectory
data.comment: Current occupants and registered contact information for a specific residential area.

data.name: SalesRecords
data.comment: Information of a settlement's gross and profit, stock exports and outstanding invoices.

data.name: SettlementDefencePlans
data.comment: Defensive tactics intended to protect a specific settlement from a hostile force.

data.name: ShareholderInformation
data.comment: A list of individuals and groups who have a financial stake in a settlement or organisation.

data.name: SurveilleanceLogs
data.comment: Audiovisual data gathered using technological monitoring and/or tracking techniques.

data.name: SyntheticPathogen
data.comment: A synthesised virus created by splicing together several different diseases.

data.name: TaxRecords
data.comment: Details of an organisation's tax payments and related documentation.

data.name: TopographicalSurveys
data.comment: Measurements and analysis of a specific area of a planetary body's surface.

data.name: TravelPermits
data.comment: A registry of all travel permits assigned to the personnel of a company or facility.

data.name: TroopDeploymentRecords
data.comment: Details of personnel and equipment used during a military or security operation.

data.name: TrueFormFossil
data.comment: The perfectly preserved remains of a long-dead organism.

data.name: UnionMembership
data.comment: Personnel who have signed up to a trade or labour union or political lobby

data.name: UniversalTranslator
data.comment: A wearable device capable of instantaneously translating any of the most common human languages.

data.name: VaccinationRecords
data.comment: A list of vaccinations issued to each member of a settlement's personnel.

data.name: VaccineResearch
data.comment: Results of clinical experiments and efficacy tests of a particular vaccine.

data.name: VirologyData
data.comment: Genetic analysis of a virus and research into its composition, symptoms and transmission.

data.name: VisitorRegister
data.comment: A list of non-employee personnel logged at a settlement within a certain time period.

data.name: WeaponInventory
data.comment: A comprehensive record of all weaponry and ammunition stored at a facility.

data.name: PersonalDocuments
data.comment: An assortment of personal data.

data.name: TacticalPlans
data.comment: An outline for a military or security operation intended to achieve a stated objective.

data.name: ChemicalProcessSample
data.comment: A sample of an unidentified substance used in a settlement's chemical production line.

data.name: PyrolyticCatalyst
data.comment: A substance that greatly alters the chemical properties of material it interacts with.

data.name: WeaponSchematic
data.comment: A technical blueprint detailing the design and mechanism of a personal firearm.

data.name: Californium
data.comment: A highly radioactive chemical element.

data.name: SuitSchematic
data.comment: A technical blueprint detailing the design of a protective suit.

data.name: Spyware
data.comment: A program designed to infiltrate digital networks and collect data without detection.

data.name: EmploymentHistory
data.comment: A detailed list of an individual’s prior employment, roles and professional experience.

data.name: AgriculturalProcessSample
data.comment: A sample of an unidentified substance used in a settlement's agricultural production line.

data.name: SurveillanceEquipment
data.comment: An assortment of audio-visual and biometric monitoring devices.

data.name: InsightDataBank
data.comment: A device designed to store audio-visual data recorded via Insight.

data.name: ShipSchematic
data.comment: A technical blueprint detailing the internal and external design of a starship.

data.name: VehicleSchematic
data.comment: A technical blueprint detailing the internal and external design of a surface vehicle.

data.name: Virus
data.comment: A program designed to infect digital networks and cause targeted or systemic damage.

data.name: ChemicalSample
data.comment: An unidentified chemical compound.

data.name: IonisedGas
data.comment: A quantity of ionised gas.

data.name: Aerogel
data.comment: An extremely lightweight thermal insulator.

data.name: CarbonFibrePlating
data.comment: A flexible, lightweight material made of organic polymers.

data.name: MicroSuperCapacitor
data.comment: A device designed to store an electric charge.

data.name: TitaniumPlating
data.comment: A strong, low-density metal that is highly resistant to corrosion.

data.name: CircuitSwitch
data.comment: A simple device designed to close an electronic circuit.

data.name: EncryptedMemoryChip
data.comment: An integrated circuit designed to securely store software data.

data.name: EpoxyAdhesive
data.comment: A multipurpose polymer adhesive.

data.name: MemoryChip
data.comment: An integrated circuit designed to store software data.

data.name: ManufacturingInstructions
data.comment: Detailed construction guidance, ranging from individual items to mass production requirements.

data.name: StellarActivityLogs
data.comment: Measurements of a star’s characteristics and related phenomena.

data.name: ElectricalWiring
data.comment: Multipurpose wiring for use in a variety of electronic devices.

data.name: MicroTransformer
data.comment: A compact transformer designed to transfer electrical energy between two circuits.

data.name: ElectricalFuse
data.comment: A simple device designed to protect an electrical circuit from excess current.

data.name: OpticalFibre
data.comment: A length of fine cable designed to transfer data in the form of light.

data.name: CircuitBoard
data.comment: A component from an electrical system.

data.name: MetalCoil
data.comment: Commonplace metal for use in electrical circuits and hydraulic systems.

data.name: Motor
data.comment: A machine designed to transform electrical energy into kinetic energy.

data.name: MicroElectrode
data.comment: A simple device designed to create a small electric arc.

data.name: Graphene
data.comment: A multipurpose carbon allotrope.

data.name: MicroHydraulics
data.comment: Small, powerful hydraulic devices.

data.name: Scrambler
data.comment: A device designed to distort electromagnetic waves.

data.name: TungstenCarbide
data.comment: A compound of tungsten and carbon.

data.name: Electromagnet
data.comment: A magnet in which the magnetic field is produced by an electric current.

data.name: Transmitter
data.comment: An electronic device designed to produce electromagnetic waves.

data.name: AXCombatLogs
data.comment: Data related to anti-xeno operations and encounters with hostile Thargoid forces.

data.name: BallisticsData
data.comment: Projectile weapon research including launch mechanisms, accuracy and impact damage.

data.name: ChemicalWeaponData
data.comment: Information about chemical-based armaments and their effects on both organic and non-organic targets.

data.name: ClassicEntertainment
data.comment: Well-known and critically acclaimed multimedia products maintained from past generations.

data.name: CocktailRecipes
data.comment: Instructions for mixing sophisticated alcoholic or non-alcoholic beverages from many star systems.

data.name: ConflictHistory
data.comment: Detailed civil, political or military records relating to a faction conflict.

data.name: CriminalRecords
data.comment: An account of criminal convictions and other legal transgressions wthin a specific population.

data.name: CropYieldAnalysis
data.comment: Records of crop production levels and projections for future harvest quotas.

data.name: CulinaryRecipes
data.comment: Step-by-step instructions using available ingredients to create meals from scratch.

data.name: EmployeeExpenses
data.comment: Records of business expense claims and charges made to company credit accounts.

data.name: EnhancedInterrogationRecordings
data.comment: Recordings of information gathered from a subject via non-standard interview techniques.

data.name: EspionageMaterial
data.comment: Highly sensitive data on an individual or group acquired without the target's knowledge.

data.name: ExtractionYieldData
data.comment: Raw data mineral production quantities from a settlement's mining operation.

data.name: FleetRegistry
data.comment: Official registration and deployment records of all ships controlled by an organisation.

data.name: GeneSequencingData
data.comment: Molecular analysis of DNA samples to determine the nucleic acid sequence.

data.name: GeneticResearch
data.comment: Scientific data and proposals related to genome study and genetic manipulation.

data.name: GeologicalData
data.comment: Information on a planet's composition, physical structure and regional arrangement.

data.name: HydroponicData
data.comment: Horticultural analysis and results from using soilless methods of plant growth.

data.name: IncidentLogs
data.comment: Notable occurances or unexpected events that occurred at a settlement.

data.name: InfluenceProjections
data.comment: Assessments of potential changes to a company's standing with various political bodies.

data.name: InterrogationRecordings
data.comment: Information acquired during one or more sessions of subject questioning.

data.name: InterviewRecordings
data.comment: Evaluations of potential employees under consideration for employment at a facility.

data.name: JobApplications
data.comment: Media submitted to demonstrate a candidate's suitability for a given vacancy.

data.name: Kompromat
data.comment: Highly sensitive material used to compromise, blackmail or manipulate individuals or groups.

data.name: MedicalRecords
data.comment: A collection of medical data related to a specific group or population.

data.name: MiningAnalytics
data.comment: Scientific data used to increase the safety and efficiency of a specific mining operation.

data.name: NetworkSecurityProtocols
data.comment: Listed cryptographic methods for a network's data and connected channels.

data.name: OpinionPolls
data.comment: Statistics and viewpoints gathered from surveys of a population sample.

data.name: PatientHistory
data.comment: Personal records of an individual's health including illnesses, surgeries and prescriptions.

data.name: PhotoAlbums
data.comment: A personal collection of static images in digital or holographic formats.

data.name: PlantGrowthCharts
data.comment: Analytical data presented in graph format that catalogues horticultural development.

data.name: PoliticalAffiliations
data.comment: A faction's alliances and relationships with other organisations based on political ideologies.

data.name: PrisonerLogs
data.comment: Detailed records of all individuals held incarcerated at a given facility.

data.name: Propaganda
data.comment: Promotional material designed to publicise a specific claim or political viewpoint.

data.name: RecyclingLogs
data.comment: Measured output and subsequent application of a settlement's byproducts and general waste.

data.name: RiskAssessments
data.comment: Evaluations of safety measures and potential hazards at a facility or operation.

data.name: SecurityExpenses
data.comment: Financial details for equipment and personnel used to maintain a settlement's security force.

data.name: SeedGeneaology
data.comment: Records of the origins and genetic characteristics of plantable seeds.

data.name: SettlementAssaultPlans
data.comment: Detailed military tactics designed for use at a specific settlement.

data.name: SlushFundLogs
data.comment: Details of credit accounts which lack proper accounting, usually for illicit reasons.

data.name: SmearCampaignPlans
data.comment: A proposal to spread toxic information intended to damage a reputation.

data.name: SpectralAnalysisData
data.comment: A collection of detailed electromagnetic measurements made using spectroscopic equipment.

data.name: VIPSecurityDetail
data.comment: Assignments and deployment schedules of agents assigned to protect key personnel.

data.name: WeaponTestData
data.comment: Analysis of the performance and effectiveness of newly designed weaponry or related enhancements.

data.name: XenoDefenceProtocols
data.comment: Combatant tactics and settlement instructions in the event of a non-human attack.

data.name: ChemicalCatalyst
data.comment: A compound used to accelerate chemical reactions.

data.name: ChemicalSuperbase
data.comment: A highly soluble chemical with a wide range of applications.

data.name: Epinephrine
data.comment: A synthesised hormone that increases cardiac output and raises blood-glucose levels.

data.name: OxygenicBacteria
data.comment: Cultivated bacteria used to produce large amounts of oxygen.

data.name: pHNeutraliser
data.comment: A compound designed to neutralise the pH levels of acids and alkalis.

data.name: RDX
data.comment: A highly explosive nitramide compound.

data.name: ViscoelasticPolymer
data.comment: An elastic material used in shock absorption and vibration dampening.

data.name: IonBattery
data.comment: A portable power source for use in electronic devices.

data.name: MicroThrusters
data.comment: Small, powerful propulsive devices.

data.name: OpticalLens
data.comment: An optical component designed to converge or diverge light.

data.name: WeaponComponent
data.comment: A component from a personal firearm.

data.name: SyntheticGenome
data.comment: An artificial set of genes.

data.name: RefinementProcessSample
data.comment: A sample of an unidentified substance used in a settlement's refinery.

data.name: PetrifiedFossil
data.comment: The calcified remains of a long-dead organism.

data.name: PersonalComputer
data.comment: A compact personal computing device.

data.name: NutritionalConcentrate
data.comment: A nutritionally rich meal-replacement product.

data.name: MutagenicCatalyst
data.comment: A compound designed to induce and accelerate cellular mutation.

data.name: MicrobialInhibitor
data.comment: A compound designed to hinder the growth of undesirable microorganisms.

data.name: InorganicContaminant
data.comment: A toxic substance that corrodes inorganic materials.

data.name: InertiaCanister
data.comment: A specialised container for the safe storage of unstable agents.

data.name: HealthMonitor
data.comment: A personal device designed to monitor the user's general health.

data.name: GMeds
data.comment: Pharmaceuticals designed to prevent motion sickness by acclimating the user to the prevailing gravitic conditions.

data.name: GeneticRepairMeds
data.comment: Sophisticated pharmaceuticals designed to target and replace damaged or mutated genes.

data.name: DeepMantleSample
data.comment: A sample from the innermost part of a geological body's mantle.

data.name: CompressionLiquefiedGas
data.comment: A quantity of gas highly compressed into a liquid-state.

data.name: CastFossil
data.comment: An impression of a long-dead organism.
